xwikidoc.author: XWiki.TodHarter
xwikidoc.title: Kingdom Of Othan
xwikidoc.content: The Kingdom of Othan is a powerful human kingdom located in the eastern part of Erithnoi, to the east of the [[Midrealms>>url:http://www.giantelectronicbrain.com/xwiki/bin/view/Player/Midrealms]] and southeast of [[Sildune>>url:http://www.giantelectronicbrain.com/xwiki/bin/view/Player/Sildune]]. This area was the heart of the old Cardolan Empire, and the City of Cardol once stood near the center of this land. 350 years ago the barbarian Othani occupied the entire area at the end of the Cardolan Empire. They were able to create a strong and populous kingdom which has endured to this day.
